The Carbon Dioxide Information Analysis Center (CDIAC) bụ nzukọ dị n'ime Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Ike nke United States nke nwéré ọrụ bụ isi màkà inye gọọmentị US na ndị na-eme nchọpụta data na nyocha na-ekpo ọkụ ụwa dịka ọ metụtara nsogbu ike
CDIAC, na enye màkà ya World Data Center for Atmospheric Trace Gases, lekwasịrị ányà n'inweta, nyochaa na ikesa data metụtara mgbanwe ihu igwe na ikuku na-ekpo ọkụ.
E hiwere CDIAC n'afọ 1982 ma dị n'ime Ngalaba Sayensị Na-ahụ Màkà Gbụrụ-gbúrụ Ébé Obibi nke Oak Ridge National Laboratory
CDIAC mechiri n'ọnwa Septemba ụbọchị iri atọ, afọ 2017, ma kesaa data ya n'ọtụtụ ebe nchekwa dị iche iche
E bugara ọtụtụ n'ime data ahụ na US Department of Energy's (DOE) Environmental System Science Data Infrastructure for a Virtual Ecosystem (ESS-DIVE) archive

A gbanwere data Oceanic Trace Gas gaa na usoro data ọhụrụ Ocean Carbon (OCADS) nke NOAA's National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI) na https://www.nodc.noaa.gov/ocads/ na-arụ ọrụ. A gbanwere data Total Carbon Column Observing Network (TCCON) gaa na Caltech (http://tccondata.org/). HIAPER Pole-to-Pole Observations (HIPPO) data na-agafe na NCAR Earth Observing Laboratory (https://www.eol.ucar.edu/data-software).
